title: can i get banned from using in game fonts by using a program called wooxy?

replies.body: Using third party programs and modifications are at your own risk, and not something we support.  We can't provide any help if something goes wrong and we don't know what malicious content that could be hidden.  Review our [stance ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)and be wary of what you select to use!
